alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 1:25PM CDT until September 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western West Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southern Pointe Coupee Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lottie, or 8 miles east of Krotz Springs, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Plaquemine, New Roads, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Erwinville, Ramah, Bayou Sorrel, and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 149. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
